content: I think I'll also mention my TikTok success in the Twitter thread, since it's relevant to the tutorial. I might say something like, "As you know, my TikTok account has been booming lately, with over 1,000 new followers in the past two weeks alone! I think it's because I've been posting more creative and entertaining content, like my dance videos and lip syncs. But I'm excited to share this more in-depth tutorial with you all on Twitter, where I can give you a closer look at my makeup techniques and favorite products." This way, I can tie in my TikTok success and give my Twitter followers a sense of what they can expect from the tutorial.
